cards.header: Gutora sujet nziza niyo shingiro y’inkuru yawe mugabo n’ubuhe buryo bwiza bwo guhitamwo sujet no gutegura inkuru yawe?

cards.text:
## Muri iki cigwa muzokwiga  
• ico mutegerezwa kwiyumvira imbere yo gutangura inkuru yawe.  
• gute wotegura inkuru yawe.  
• gute wiyumvira abo ushaka guha inkuru mumwanya umwe wiyumvira n’inkuru yawe.

Imbere yo gutangura gukora igice c’ijwi, hariho ibibazo mubanza kwishura…n’ubuhe buryo burashe bwokumvisha inkuru yawe ?mbega n’inkuru y’umunsi mukuru ,y’umuntu canke ikibazo kizwi kiraho ?menya ko iyo nkuru iraba ibintu vyabaye vuba, ingaruka y’iyo ngorane kubanyagihugu canke inkuru k’umuntu ahambaye…angle y’iyo nkuru yawe ni iyihe ?uburyo bwizabwokwiyumvira sujet iryoshe gukora ukiyumvira kandi gute iyo nkuru iza gukorako abantu basanzwe…ni bande ugomba guha inkuru yawe ?n’igiki kiryoshemwo kuburyo boyumviriza ?murashobora gushikiriza inkuru mu buryo bwumvikana kandi buryohoye ?ni bihe bice bitandukanye bigize iyo nkuru yawe ?....nayahe majwi mushaka gufata ?ibiganiro,canke ibice vy’insiguro zihambaye vyamajwi y’inkuru ?...mbe hakenewe umwanya ungana gute kugira ukore inkuru yawe ?

cards.header: N’ubuhe bwoko bwa segment y’amajwi mutoshobora gukora iyaba mwari mwishamba?

cards.text: Umaze gushira aho ingene ugukora ,utegerezwa kwitegura neza .ukiha umwanya wo gufata amajwi n’abaguha inkuru.ugategura aho uza gufatira amajwi ukaharaba ko hateguye neza kugira uze gukorera ahantu hahuye n’ivyo uza gukora.

![itegurwa ry’amajwi](4.png)  
tegura neza ngene uzofata amajwi imbere yuko utangura gufata amajwi. Iyo nteguro yawe itegerezwa kuba ifise.

Ntiwibagire kwibaza :kuberiki ndiko ndagira uyu mugambi ?mbe hariho abantu bazwi ushaka gushikira?  
Tanaga umwanya ukwiye mu gusohora no kwerekana inkuru yawe.birashoboka kushobora guhindura plan uravye amasanamu hamwe n’inkuru ushobora kuronka.

## ICO KUTIBAGIRA  
• Tegura igikorwa cawe, ntufate amajwi vyose
• capa ngene uza gukora kugira bize kugufasha mugihe uzoba uriko uravugana nabo bantu canke uriko uramufata amajwi.hamagara abozoguha ikiganiro hakiri kare ubabaze aho mwohurira na ryari mwobonana
• Banza mwiyumvire abo mushaka kubwira inkuru yanyu imbere yukuvuga uti ngira nkore iyi nkuru canke ngira mfate amajwi ameze gutya.

choices.text: I segment de  style documentaire ihagaze kumajwi y’ibidukikije

cards.question: Nimba mushaka guhabwa ikiganiro n’umukuru w’igisagara gikomeye, gute mwobikora?

choices.text: Hamagara kubiro iwe ,idondore n’ikikungenza ,hama hana isango.
Kuja mubiro k’umukuru w’igisagara uno munsi hama usabe ushimike aguhe ikiganiro cihuta.
Menya aho umukuru w’igisagara afungurira hama winyegeze inyuma y’igiti mugihe azoba asohotse.
